channel.title: Can someone explain this moderation decision to me?
channel.description:
I was infracted for this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548767.msg4038864.html#msg4038864 However nothing was done about 3 pages of spam starting here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,551024.msg4038731.html#msg4038731?
And don't pull the "you're a respected member of the community and should know better" card on me, because they should fall into that same category...

item.title: Can someone explain this moderation decision to me?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I was infracted for this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548767.msg4038864.html#msg4038864
However nothing was done about 3 pages of spam starting here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,551024.msg4038731.html#msg4038731?

And don’t pull the “you’re a respected member of the community and should know better” card on me, because they should fall into that same category…

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone explain this moderation decision to me?
